currency.description: Internal string identifier of the Divine Code variant used for this group of Combat Manuals.

start.description: The date-time since which the listed Combat Manuals are available.

finish.description: Expiration date-time of the listed Combat Manuals.

items.description: A single Combat Manual compile target.

prerequisite.description: JSON path representing the prerequisite Combat Manual that must be compiled to unlock the current Manual, or null if the current Manual can be compiled right away.

cost.description: Number of Divine Codes of the specified variant required to compile this Combat Manual.

is_permanent.description: True for Normal Combat Manuals, false for Limited-Time.

part.description: Part number for permanent Divine Codes or month number for limited-time Codes.
